chapters.title: Chapter 27: A Call to Stand
chapters.info: Takima, p. 429—Sitter for the Brown Ajah for almost nine years. She fled Tar Valon when Siuan was deposed. She now sits with Lelaine's Sitters. She is short, and has long dark hair to her waist. Her skin is aged and ivory-colored, and she is often described as quiet and bird-like. She was the lone Brown present at the unannounced meeting of the Hall that Egwene managed to find out about anyway.
